perpsAutoCloseStopLossPnlPercent: Set your stop-loss level as a percentage loss from your entry. When your unrealized PnL drops to this percentage, an order will be triggered to close the position. Actual execution price may vary due to market conditions, and losses could exceed this amount in volatile markets.
perpsAutoCloseTakeProfitPnlDollars: Enter the profit amount at which you'd like to take profit. When your unrealized PnL reaches this value, an order will be triggered to close the position. Actual execution price may vary due to market conditions.
perpsAutoCloseStopLossPnlDollars: Enter the target loss amount at which to close the position. When your unrealized PnL drops to this value, an order will be triggered to close the position. In volatile markets, the actual loss may exceed this amount.
perpsAutoCloseTakeProfitPrice: Set the market price at which to take profit. When the market reaches this price, an order will be triggered to close your position. Execution price may vary due to slippage and market conditions.
perpsAutoCloseStopLossPrice: Set the market price where you want to limit losses. When the market reaches this price, an order will be triggered to close your position. In fast-moving markets, execution may occur at a worse price, and losses could exceed your target.

perpsEducationBannerTitle: Learn the basics of trading perpetual futures
perpsEducationMessageSlide_intro: With perpetual futures, you're not just trading assets, you're trading what you think will happen next.
perpsEducationMessageSlide_long: You think the price will go up. If you're right, you can earn. If it goes down, you lose.
perpsEducationMessageSlide_short: You think the price will go down. If you're right, you can earn. If it goes up, you lose.
perpsEducationMessageSlide_leverage: Leverage increases the potential profits and losses when the token price changes.
perpsEducationMessageSlide_liquidation: If the price hits your liquidation price your position will be closed. Using higher leverage increases the risk of being liquidated.
perpsEducationMessageSlide_riskTolerance: Your leverage will be set based on your risk tolerance, but you can always adjust it when opening a position.
perpsEducationRiskToleranceDescriptionhi: I can handle high volatility and I am prepared to risk losing most or all of my investment.
perpsEducationRiskToleranceDescriptionme: I can handle moderate volatility and I am prepared to risk losing a significant portion of my investment.
perpsEducationRiskToleranceDescriptionlo: I can handle only a small amount of volatility and I am only prepared to risk losing some of my investment.
perpsIntroInterstitialDescription: Use Perps to speculate if a token's price will go up ("long") or down ("short"). Play the market in a whole new way.
perpsIntroInterstitialFeature1Descriptio: Only risk the funds you put in
perpsIntroInterstitialFeature2Descriptio: Choose a risk level that's right for you
tokenizedEquityLearnTitle2: Learn how they work and more.
perpsTradingDisclaimer: Trading perpetual contracts involves significant risk, including the potential for sudden and total loss of your investment and collateral due to high leverage and market volatility, and may not be suitable for all users. Prices may be influenced by funding rates and liquidity and you may be subject to automatic liquidations without notice. Market data provided by Hyperliquid.
